creator: atbit@vmail.ru
text:
Hi there!

When the title attribute appears in HTML, it turns into smth. unpleasant:
WAS:
<a href="/" title="Ohh, title">
IS:
<a href="/" void ="Ohh, title">

Several Apache versions under Windows, FreeBSD and Linux have been tested.


Thanks!
Victor Mironov
atbit@vmail.ru

creator: atbit@vmail.ru
text: Sorry, this is rather bug of routing software :-(
